Strategic partnership with Northstone lays foundation for business success 

Paul Convery, Head of Business, BT Enterprise in Northern Ireland In our modern fast-paced economy, customers look for ever more efficient, innovative and flexible network and communication services which offer best value for money and help to future-proof their business.

Advertorial by

Pictures and video: St Patrick's Day 2019 parades in Belfast, Armagh, Newry, Omagh and Strabane 

Thousands of people took part in festivities across Northern Ireland to celebrate St Patrick on Sunday, March 17.

The apprenticeship platform connecting young people with workplaces 

Are you a school leaver seeking access to the workplace? Or maybe you're an employer looking for the talent of the future? Connect to Success is a trusted and free website that offers just that…

Advertorial by

The Queen’s University event that could change your world 

Queen’s University is hosting ‘An Audience with The Graduate School’ on Thursday 28 March to showcase why postgraduate study can change your world by enhancing your employability, opening a world of opportunities and giving you access to influential peers all while fine-tuning your skill set.
